extendedInfo.description: Try to find the hidden word! Each correct attempt entered in the grid will provide you clues like letters correctly and wrongly placed. But watch the clock!Enjoy our 6-letter dictionary in several game modes: Quick Game, Time Attack, Limited attempts and Duel. Dictionaries up to 11 letters are available in Delingo Pro... and more modes coming soon!Ask for the definition of any word using the contextual menu integrated into the game grid.This Lingo game is provided by Flowing Edges.(Keywords: lingo, motus, word, letter, game, mastermind, demotus)

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Sometimes they just put made-up words or uninpropiate word. Uninstalling!! FOREVER I WILL NEVER INSTALL!!!!!!
reviews.author: Nashifa Muchtar

reviews.comment: New version now contains a filtered dictionary with most frequent words. This solves problems with non-existent and slang words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its not just regular words. There are also slang words, made up words and inappropriate words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best word game
reviews.comment: Pro version allows different word lengths. Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User
